entries.title: Publications-list
entries.text: The publications of the Bank of Greece below, are available in pdf format and you can search for the one that may interest you.

entries.title: ECB-Publications
entries.text: The Economic Bulletin presents the economic and monetary information which forms the basis for the ECB Governing Council's policy decisions.

entries.title: Publications
entries.text: They primarily aim to underline and highlight the role of the Bank of Greece in the country's financial, social and cultural development.

entries.title: Economic-Bulletin
entries.text: The Economic Bulletin publishes research papers on issues of relevance to the Greek economy. Featuring articles and studies of topical interest.

entries.title: Monetary-and-banking-statistics
entries.text: The Bank of Greece publishes on a monthly (or quarterly) basis data on bank deposits and credit, as well as on the key monetary aggregates.

entries.title: Statistical-data
entries.text: The data series are presented on a daily basis for the last 30 trading days and on a monthly basis from March 1999. The current year's daily trading volumes in ...

entries.title: Statistics-Directorate
entries.text: The purpose of Bank of Greece statistics is to provide reliable information to the general public and researchers in Greece and abroad.

entries.title: Monetary policy
entries.text: Monetary policy refers to decisions taken by central banks and influencing the cost and availability of money in an economy.

entries.title: Monetary policy decisions and operational framework for monetary ...
entries.text: Learn about monetary policy decisions and the operational framework for monetary policy implementation.
